commit.title: Update redis docs for PING and QUIT
fix a memory leak bug for mset command
readme: Link to HTTPS for wikimedia.org
Fix spec file to work for RHEL >= 6 and wrong changelog date
Add script to build the SRPM package for RPM-based distributions
Revert "Fix parsing bug when error body contains no spaces"
Add Uber to the list of Adopters
optimize performance when single key del
Fix parsing bug when error body contains no spaces
Added Wayfair to list of companies that use this.
Add switch to use TCPKEEPALIVE option
all keys in yaml file must have a non-empty value - issue 381
refactored how redis_auth is handled through authenticated option; redis_auth is only enabled for a redis pool
redis_auth directly is only valid for a redis pool
unquote strings in the RSP_STRING table
added a #define table for redis response string
backend server hostnames are resolved lazily
getaddrinfo returns non-zero +ve value on error
use sockinfo field in server and server_pool struct, instead of storing individual (int:family, socklen_t:addrlen, sockaddr:addr)
log when memcache request have empty or non-existent keys
mark server as failed on protocol level transiet failures like -OOM, -LOADING, etc.
implemented support for parsing fine grained redis error response
Remove redundant conditional judgement in rbtree deletion
fix crahs when without get command
fix bug mset has invalid pair
Merge branch 'feature/issue-323' of https://github.com/charsyam/twemproxy into charsyam-feature/issue-323
temp fix a core on kqueue,
Allow touch key with negative number
Added beholder to the Utils section, a python agent that works together redis sentinel used to extend the HA capabilities of twemproxy even after a redis node has failed.
updated redis.md since SORT command takes only a single key
SORT command can take multiple arguments. So it should be part of redis_argn() and not redis_arg0()
remove incorrect assert because client could send data after sending a quit request which must be discarded
Allow file permissions to be set for UNIX domain listening socket
Return error if formatted is greater than mbuf size by using nc_vsnprintf() in msg_prepend_format()
added comments on snprintf() and scnprintf()
create default implementations for init() and swallow_msg() handlers in memcache
fix req_make_reply on msg_get, mark it as response
Check the configuration before start in the nutcracker.init script.
Added Hootsuite to list of twemproxy users in readme
naming, error chk, and remove useless code
Adds init script for debian servers
fix core on invalid mset like "mset a a a"
Update Redis notes with info about SORT support.
Add support for SORT command in redis.
add hscan/sscan/zscan cmd, but the rsp parse need upgrade
use msg_append to avoid small mbuf fragments
Add Committers section to reflect reality
use array(keypos) to trace all key positions (start and end) in the message struct,
modifies base on Manj's review advise.
Merge branch 'safe_max_connections' of github.com:allenlz/twemproxy into allenlz-safe_max_connections
disallow zero weight in the servers section of conf
resolved conflicts for merge from mattrobenolt-hyperloglog
add msg->fragement handler, main logic of mget-improve is put into proto/
1. do not rewrite the orig mget as a ping msg for redis, and del useless code
fix bug on msg_fragment_argx when key_len=mbuf_size-1
enhance error handling on backend down
fix multi DEL, a bug on parse key, and remove assert on conn_sendv
After rebase: mget split to many mget and send to backend
maintain a safe number for max client connections to solve ENFILE issue
add curr_connections and total_connections counter and put into stats
fix to handle max open file limit
treat ECONNABORTED from accept() syscall as a transient error
fix(nutcracker.spec): Fails to build on RHEL 6
Refixed in a simpler way by just closing the server connection on any stray response
Handle case where server responds while the request is still being sent (usually SERVER_ERROR)
Forgot to add CentOS 6 specific if statement for binary directory
Adding CentOS hooks for spec to build on 6.x
change all loga to log_safe in signal handler.
SRANDMEMBER support for the optional count argument
introducing msg_type_strings[] array of message type string reprs
increased mbuf max size to 16 MB
adjust coding style after Manju's review
Added Ooyala to list of users in README.md
add the timestamp when the server was ejected
comments on why we need to check for ENOENT in event port's event_del_conn()
set descriptor to -1 after it is close() - helps debugging
checking NC_HAVE_BACKTRACE requires nc_core.h to be included first
can't ASSERT(!conn->connecting) in rsp_recv_next() because a fresh connect() might fail with errno which triggers a readable event on server socket
introducing event_add_in() and event_del_in() for readable events
kevent() should wait indefinitely when timeout < 0; also introduced conn_to_ctx helper func
rename evbase to event_base; rename nc_event.h EV_ to EVENT_
Move nutcracker to sbin instead of bin
Replace the MD5 code with an alternative implementation, better suited to this codebase (paravoid).
define __offsetof only if it is not defined
libevent.a to encpasulate event abstractions like epoll, kequeue etc.
support for set ex/px/nx/xx for redis 2.6.12 and up
crc32 implementation is not correct but is compatible with libmemcached; use crc32a for the correct crc32 implementation
redis keys must be less than mbuf_data_size() in length
add test for dump and restore
need to specify accepted num of args
need to specify accepted num of args
Use of the weight value in the modula distribution.
Add support to unix socket connections to servers
only check for duplicate server name and not 'host:port:weight' when 'name' is configured
RPOPLPUSH, Set, and Sorted Set Operation Support (@dcartoon)
only tokenize arg2, when request is redis_argeval
Remove TODO for rejecting EVAL/EVALSHA with 0 keys since this is now implemented.
Fix off-by-one bug when ensuring that there is at least 1 byte to parse for the number of keys in an EVAL/EVALSHA invocation.
Modify proto/nc_redis.c to reject EVAL/EVALSHA with 0 keys.
Edit notes/redis.md to discuss EVAL/EVALSHA support.
Fix to check the number of remaining arguments correctly (check rnarg instead of narg, which is the number of arguments in total).
Fix bug in redis parsing protocol when we're parsing the arguments to the EVAL/EVALSHA command.

Add simple eval/evalsha support. eval currently only supports scripts with one key (if you specify more than one key, eval will silently complete, but may not do the right thing). evalsha works as well, but there's no way to script load via twemproxy.
Give nc_epoll.c:evbase_destroy() the same semantics as free() in that passing NULL in is a no-op.
Ensure that we don't evbase_destroy(NULL). Give evbase_destroy() the same semantics as free() - that is, passing a NULL pointer in is just a no-op.
exit 1 if configuration file is invalid
Fix typo in define of NC_HAVE_BACKTRACE
Produce an error message when ./configure is run if neither epoll or kqueue is supported, instead of producing confusing link errors because both nc_epoll.c and nc_kqueue.c are empty.
Provide support for platforms without backtrace support (e.g. FreeBSD).
Add #include for nc_event.h to nc_stats.c so that we have the function prototype for evbase_create.
Get rid of extraneous local variables.
Use EV_SET instead of memset and manually setting fields.
add nc_epoll.c nc_kqueue.c and  remove nc_event.c
return non-zero exit status when nutcracker cannot start for some reason
Converts identdation to 4 spaces in init script
Fixes .yml extension on included conf file for SPEC file
Modifies SPEC file to use init and conf file from tarball
Adds RPM Build SPEC file, init script and example config file
add inet4 and inet6 addrlen macro
Fix fail long FQDN name resolve
issue #35 User server names in stats
fix the off-by-one error when calculating redis key length
apply review for allow an optional instance name
Allow an optional instance name for consistent hashing
add -D or --describe-stats command-line argument to print stats description
setup pre/post splitcopy and pre/post coalesce handlers in msg struct
memcache pre_splitcopy, post_splitcopy, pre_coalesce and post_coalesce handlers
every fragment of a msg vector keeps track of the first/last fragment, number of fragments and fragment owner
set up msg parser handler for memcache connections
refactor parsing code and create header file nc_proto.h
fix the memcache response parser when tokens split across multiple mbufs
stats_listen should use st->addr as the listening address string
do away with bit fields storage, retrieval arithmetic, delete and cas in msg struct
delete stats tracking memcache requests and responses; stats module no longer tracks protocol related stats
on msg_repair, msg->pos should point to nbuf->pos and not nbuf->last
refactor memcache parsing code into proto directory
add redis option to configuration file
fix macro definition strXcmp error for big endian
recommendation doc for running nutcracker in production
log error for request whose keys exceed maximum key length
close server connection on a stray response and send "SERVER_ERROR Invalid argument" to all outstanding client requests on the given server connection. Bug found by yashh and bmatheny
added zero-copy section to nutcracker readme.md
command line option to set mbuf chunk size
use _exit(0) instead of exit(0) when daemonizing
use loga instead of log_stderr in nc_stacktrace
